This software is depending on the following libraries, protocol or languages:

OpenGL
http://www.opengl.org/

GLFW
http://glfw.sourceforge.net/

GLee
http://elf-stone.com/glee.php

DevIL
http://openil.sourceforge.net/


Python
http://python.org/

Cython
http://www.cython.org/

NumPy
http://numpy.scipy.org/

XMPP
http://xmpp.org/

xmpppy
http://xmpppy.sourceforge.net/

wxPython
http://www.wxpython.org/


RakNet (v3.23)
http://www.jenkinssoftware.com/raknet/index.html


FMOD
FMOD Sound System', copyright © Firelight Technologies Pty, Ltd., 1994-2009.
http://www.fmod.org/

For more information see the the directorys with the same names as the libraries or protocols mentioned above. These directorys are located in the same directory as this file.
